--- layout: component title: Alert description: An alert is a dismissible message that gives users feedback when an in-page event occurs. Use alerts to notify users of the outcome of some action or process. guidelines: do: - Confirm to use that a process was successfully completed - Warn user that an item may need attention - Notify user that a process was unsuccessful or an error occurred dont: - Place a call to action inside an alert - Display multiple messages at the same time contents: - Usage guidelines - Alert options ---
